attributes.additional_details: Theresa May only thinks of herself, she has not lead her party nor the country in a manner that befits as PM. She is self seeking and puts herself first, her motifs are not in the best interest of the UK
attributes.background:
Theresa May

Has lost control of her party, the UK has lost all confidence in her as PM.
She has not handled Brexit in a manner in which the UK voted for.

rejection.details: If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
